duties_responsibilities.duty: Seek new business opportunities by contacting and developing relationships with both current and potential customers.
Educate and sell Kaptyn’s business solutions and services to new and existing customers clients.
Schedule and go through demos of our business portal and QR product.
Reach agreed upon sales targets by the deadline.
Close and follow up on sales transactions.
Network and build relationships with new and existing client base.
Communicate and coordinate with colleagues as necessary.
Ensure customer satisfaction and provide professional customer support.
Perform other related duties as required.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required
